unsigned long  rate,
int  stereo,
int  mode
) 
  

00009                                                              {
00010   int f;
00011 
00012   f=open(DSPDEV,mode,0);
00013   if(!f) dsperr("Can't open audio device " DSPDEV ".\n");
00014   if(ioctl(f,SNDCTL_DSP_SAMPLESIZE,&bits)<0)
00015     dsperr("Can't set bitrate.\n");
00016   if(ioctl(f,SNDCTL_DSP_STEREO,&stereo)<0)
00017     dsperr("Can't set mono/stereo mode.\n");
00018   if(ioctl(f,SNDCTL_DSP_SPEED,&rate)<0)
00019     dsperr("Can't set audio sampling rate.\n");
00020   return f;
00021 }
